'''''deloth''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "abhorrence".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''del''</ref>

==Etymology==
[[Noldorin]] ''deloth/'''delos''''' ("abhorrence, detestation, loathing") comes from [[root]]s DYEL + GOS.<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry "DYEL"</ref>

==Examples==
*''[[Dor Daedeloth|Dor Dae'''deloth''']]'' = "Land of Great Dread"
*''[[Dagor Delothrin|Dagor '''Deloth'''rin]]'' = "Terrible Battle"
